name: Expertbotz
description: This Bot Will Help You To Store Files In Cloud Storage. You Can Add Files To The Bot By Forward the last file from a public channel to your bot and Press Yes Button.. If The Files Channl Is Private Make the bot admin on the channel and forward the last file to bot. Then Add the bot to you group and send the movie name The Bot Will Give the file in Bot PM..✮✮

ADMINS.description: Username or ID of channel or group. Separate multiple IDs by space.

DATABASE_NAME.description: Username or ID of Admin. Separate multiple Admins by space.

DATABASE_URL.description: Add some telegraph link of pictures .

LOG_CHANNEL.description: Bot Logs,Give a channel id with -100xxxxxxx

UPDATE_CHANNEL.description:
Username or ID of users to give access of inline search. Separate multiple users by space.
Leave it empty if you don't want to restrict bot usage.

WELCOME.description: ID of channel.Make sure bot is admin in this channel. Without subscribing this channel users cannot use bot.

LINK_BYPASS.description: ID of channel.Make sure bot is admin in this channel. Without subscribing this channel users cannot use bot.

BROADCAST_AS_COPY.description: Enter True if you want other shortener links to be bypassed. Read README for more information
